org.zamia.cli.jython

Class ZCJInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zamia.cli.jython.ZCJInterpreter

  • public class ZCJInterpreter
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets up a Jython interpreter for a given project, runs init + user tcl scripts Will inject zamia-specific python commands into the interpreter
    Author:
    Guenter Bartsch
